mapper.select: SELECT u.USER_ID, u.USER_NAME, u.USER_PASS, u.USER_BIRTH, u.USER_GENDER, u.USER_HP, u.USER_EMAIL, u.USER_ZIP, u.USER_ADD1, u.USER_ADD2, u.USER_CLASS, u.USER_REG_DATE, u.USER_LOGIN, u.USER_OUT, pf.user_icon AS user_icon, pf.user_introduce AS user_introduce FROM USERS u, profile pf WHERE u.USER_OUT = 'N' AND u.user_id = #{userId} AND u.user_id = pf.user_id
